data.prayer: Over 89.93 percent of the people of Al Kuwayt are far from Jesus. Lord, please send your gospel to them through the internet or radio or television today!

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Al Kuwayt, Kuwait
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, please reward those who diligently seek you with a heart of faith in the state of Al Kuwayt.
data.verse: Without faith it is impossible to be well pleasing to him, for he who comes to God must believe that he exists, and that he is a rewarder of those who seek him.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 66 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, be a refuge and strength for the hurting in Al Kuwayt, Kuwait today.
data.verse: God is our refuge and strength, an ever-present help in trouble.

data.prayer: Spirit, disrupt complacency in the 7,690 believers living in the state of Al Kuwayt. Remind them you are coming soon.
data.verse: Therefore, stay awake, for you do not know on what day your Lord is coming.

data.prayer: Lord, remember the Muhamasheen, Akhdam people. Make the Muhamasheen, Akhdam people a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for your own possession.
Spirit, cause the 7,690 believers in Al Kuwayt to obey with immediate, radical, costly obedience, like Abraham.
data.verse: Then God said, “Take your son, your only son, whom you love — Isaac — and go to the region of Moriah. Sacrifice him there as a burnt offering on a mountain I will show you.” Early the next morning Abraham got up and loaded his donkey. He took with him two of his servants and his son Isaac. When he had cut enough wood for the burnt offering, he set out for the place God had told him about.

data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in the state of Al Kuwayt to agree with you in prayer.
data.verse: I [Jesus] pray also for those who will believe in me through their message, that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.prayer: Father, we pray that the state of Al Kuwayt be filled with simple churches in every neighborhood.
data.verse: For the earth will be full of the knowledge of the Lord, as the waters cover the sea.
